detail_desc: Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a double-layered turtle neck and long sleeves.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a wrapover at the top of the back and an opening at the back.
Set with a bracelet and necklace of chunky steel curb chain with a trigger clasp. Bracelet circumference 19.5 cm. Total necklace length 48 cm.
Metal rings in various designs.
Wide metal rings in various designs.
Wide metal rings in various designs.

Set with a blouse and pair of leggings in cotton. Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs. Jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Set with a blouse and pair of leggings in cotton. Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs. Jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Set with a blouse and pair of leggings in cotton. Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs. Jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Jumper knitted in soft chenille yarn with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft chenille yarn with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft chenille yarn with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Padded soft toy in linen with an embroidered face and sewn-on clothes in an organic cotton weave. Length from top to toe approx. 36 cm. Recycled polyester filling.
Baby Exclusive. Padded soft toy in linen with an embroidered face and sewn-on clothes in an organic cotton weave. Length from top to toe approx. 36 cm. Recycled polyester filling.

Short dress in mesh decorated with beads. Round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams under the bust and on the skirt for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, one with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with lined cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the shirt jacket is partly recycled.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the shirt jacket is partly recycled.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the shirt jacket is partly recycled.
Bikini briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt jacket in a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pockets, a sleeve placket and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Short, empire-line dress in seersucker with a square neckline front and back and short, voluminous puff sleeves with elastication and a frill over the shoulders and at the hems. Gathered tier on the skirt for added width. Unlined.

Short, empire-line dress in seersucker with a square neckline front and back and short, voluminous puff sleeves with elastication and a frill over the shoulders and at the hems. Gathered tier on the skirt for added width. Unlined.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 21 pairs of studs and four pairs of hoops.

Short, A-line dress in a cotton weave with embroidery. Small frilled collar with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a frill-trimmed yoke at the front with frills going over the shoulders, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings with pearly plastic beads.

Shirt jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a concealed button, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Metal earrings and ear cuffs decorated with plastic and glass beads. Four pairs of earrings that can be worn separately or together. Three ear cuffs.

Short dress in ribbed jersey with an embroidered collar in a cotton weave. Small opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and gathered seams at the waist and lower down the skirt. Unlined.
Metal curb chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a padlock. Length 51 cm. Size of padlock 2x2 cm.

Short, fitted dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, peak lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable fabric belt at the waist with metal D-rings. Lined.

Short, fitted dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, peak lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable fabric belt at the waist with metal D-rings. Lined.
Felted coat with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Felted coat with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Sleeveless lace body with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a scalloped V-neck. Jersey lining over the bust, a V-shaped mesh insert at the waist and press-studs at the crotch.
Metal chain necklace decorated with small, round discs. Adjustable length.
Metal chain necklace decorated with small, round discs. Adjustable length.

Short dress in a lightweight weave. Lace-covered, V-shaped yoke with a flounced trim, and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long trumpet sleeves with inset lace trims at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Earrings and ear cuffs in metal. Five hoop earrings. Eight ear cuffs.
Earrings and ear cuffs in metal. Five hoop earrings. Eight ear cuffs.
V-neck dress in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester and polyamide content of the dress is recycled.
V-neck dress in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester and polyamide content of the dress is recycled.
V-neck dress in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester and polyamide content of the dress is recycled.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, one with a moon-shaped pendant and one with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, one with a moon-shaped pendant and one with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, a detachable tie belt at the waist and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, a detachable tie belt at the waist and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Trousers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and wide, straight legs.
Trousers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and wide, straight legs.

Blouse in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Concealed buttons at the top and a small stand-up collar with a frill that continues down the button band. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back and long, voluminous sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Blouse in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Concealed buttons at the top and a small stand-up collar with a frill that continues down the button band. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back and long, voluminous sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Blouse in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Concealed buttons at the top and a small stand-up collar with a frill that continues down the button band. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back and long, voluminous sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Multi-strand necklace of plastic beads in various designs with a shell-shaped pendant and metal clasp. Adjustable length approx. 42-51.5 cm.
5-pocket, calf-length skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. Unlined.
5-pocket, calf-length skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knitted scarf in a soft wool and cashmere blend with a narrow ribbed trim at the ends.

Gilet in woven fabric and faux shearling with a stand-up collar and yoke in soft faux shearling for added warmth outdoors. Practical two-way zip at the front for easy access, diagonal front pockets for safe storage of valuables and an adjustable drawstring at the hem. Lined. The gilet can be worn alone or as an outer layer over other garments. Some of the polyester content of the gilet is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight, extra-long legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight, extra-long legs with raw-edge hems.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket trousers in grained imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, lower crotch and tapered legs with visible seams at the knees.

Long-sleeved body in stretch lace with a round neckline and narrow, vertical elastication down the front, back and sides, as well as on the sleeves for a draped effect. Press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back.

Long-sleeved body in stretch lace with a round neckline and narrow, vertical elastication down the front, back and sides, as well as on the sleeves for a draped effect. Press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back.

Oversized puffer jacket in a padded weave with a high collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Diagonal side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Oversized puffer jacket in a padded weave with a high collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Diagonal side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Trainers in imitation leather with shimmering details. Padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from partly recycled polyester. Chunky soles.

Trainers in imitation leather with shimmering details. Padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from partly recycled polyester. Chunky soles.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and hook and loop tab. Fixed, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in fabric made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and hook and loop tab. Fixed, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in fabric made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
